'''Silversand Coconut Tree''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It can be purchased from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=80}}.

==Furnishing Sets==
{{Craft Usage|type=Furnishing Set}}

==Trivia==
* The item description is a reference to the Archon Quest ''[[Guizhong (Quest)|Guizhong]]'', during which [[Childe]] promises [[Qiqi]], "If Bubu Pharmacy needed a stable supply of, say, coconut milk, the Fatui could help by setting up a robust and speedy distribution network."
